Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at Archer/California
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Archer, Pershing & California, due to fire department activity near Archer/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, Archer, Pershing, then resume their normal route at California, due to fire department activity near Archer/California.

Allow extra travel time.
